name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 16, the fire on the Minsk aircraft carrier was still not extinguished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"We can experience what happened to Taiwanese audiences at the Olympics in our own country."
On the evening of August 16, at the Phoenix Legend concert in Hohhot, when the performance of "Green Whirlwind" praising the People's Liberation Army was in progress, many audience members stood up and waved the Chinese flag.
Then the organizers immediately rushed out to snatch all the national flags and threw them on a nearby work station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Wenzhou Taide Optical Glasses Factory owed wages for three months, and employees went on strike several times to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of August 7, a gas pipeline exploded in front of the Centennial Huafu on Jiefang Road in Anshan, Liaoning Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 16, one of the banks involved in the Henan Village Bank incident: Henan Yuzhou New Minsheng Bank Village Bank was sued by Henan Village Bank depositors. The Hechuan District People's Court of Chongqing City opened a trial on September 24, 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/RZfrZquVKF

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Ironically, the local official media was promoting the idea that "it was so beautiful to see the national flag waving on the scene."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 16, various Chinese associations and chambers of commerce in France jointly held a symposium to condemn the Evergreen Laurel Hotel in Paris for not hanging the Chinese flag.
At the meeting, the presidents of various chambers of commerce made clear statements on the incident. Some said they "hate" the Evergreen Hotel, and some said they would organize a legal team to further investigate the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: News on August 16: Ministry of Commerce: Achieve "zero" restrictions on foreign investment access in manufacturing as soon as possible

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 16 (Release) Shanxi Jinzhong. Recently, a 25-year-old internet celebrity named "Guoren'er" from Zuoquan County wanted to see her child after divorce. On August 9, she went to her ex-husband's house to visit him but was turned away. Because her ex-husband did not show up, she drank pesticide to commit suicide. After drinking the medicine, she sent a message to her ex-husband asking for help "Save me". However, she neither saw her child nor her ex-husband. More than 2 hours later, she was sent to the hospital for rescue and died. It is said that "Guoren'er" was arranged to marry someone in the underworld after her death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 17, Shaoguan City, Guangdong. Urban management officers took the fruits placed in front of the store and took them away. The fruit store owner said that they did not occupy the road for business.
August 17 (Released) Feng County, Shaanxi. Urban management officers entered the store and took away a cart of shoes.
August 17 (Released) Qu County, Dazhou, Sichuan. Urban management officers worked together to lift a motorcycle away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 16, the party journal Qiushi published an article: Continue to push forward the great cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics pioneered by Comrade Deng Xiaoping.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Statement outside the Beijing International Animation and Games Carnival on August 17

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Following a fatal accident involving a Chinese fishing boat in Kinmen waters in March this year, another mainland fishing boat sank on Saturday after being hit by an unidentified ship. It is reported that three of the seven people on board were rescued by nearby fishing boats, and four people are still missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some users claimed that the AI model "Doubao AI" launched by ByteDance could not generate images of Japan surrendering, but could generate images of Japan winning, which caused dissatisfaction and boycott among netizens. According to feedback from netizens, except Doubao AI, Wenyan Yixin, Xiaoai classmate, Tiangong AI, etc. could not generate such images. Some netizens said: ByteDance has been infiltrated by Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 16, the Nikkei Chinese website reported that last year, China strongly condemned Japan's discharge of nuclear waste water and completely banned the import of Japanese aquatic products on the grounds of protecting the health of Chinese consumers. However, Chinese fishing boats are still actively operating in the Sanriku waters. Both Japanese and Chinese fishermen are fishing here, but the fish caught by Japanese fishermen are banned in China, while the fish caught by Chinese fishermen are shipped back to China and put into circulation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that the Argentine Consulate General in Guangzhou announced that it would shorten its working hours from August 13 to 15 and close at 3:00 p.m. to protest the Argentine government's reduction in diplomats' salaries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reported on August 16, the China Securities Regulatory Commission: Continuously enhance investors' sense of gain and investment security.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 17, in Dazhou, Sichuan, a car hit pedestrians on a commercial street in Tuxi Town, and it was reported that seven people were injured, two of whom were seriously injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens reported on social platforms about the wage arrears in Inner Mongolia's public service sector.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, tourists waved the Chinese national flag at the scenic spot to commemorate the 79th anniversary of Japan's surrender. In response, netizens replied, "The flag is raised wrong, is it 1945 or the Republic of China period?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 15, Beijing. A student from China University of Political Science and Law posted a video saying that the school's new dormitory environment is extremely poor, water is often cut off, there are mold and moss everywhere, and the formaldehyde in the dormitory is seriously exceeded. Some students proposed to live in the better dormitory of the International Exchange Center, but the school ignored it. I hope the school can give a reasonable explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 16, Chongqing. A merchant reported that the contractor of the canteen of Sichuan International Studies University exploited the merchant, often providing students with rotten tomatoes, rotten potatoes, zombie meat, etc., and the price was more than double the market price, causing the merchant to suffer heavy losses. The merchants jointly protested, but were suppressed.
